Package index

All functions

boot_conf()
Calculates the 95% confidence interval using bootstrapping
calc_cindex()
Returns the concordance index for a dataset using a coxph fit
calc_hr()
Calculates the hazard ratio for a dataset using a coxph fit
calc_or()
Calculates the odds ratio for a dataset
create_lookup_table()
Creates a lookup table for individual prediction of risk based on PHS
cum_inc()
Compute Cumulative Incidence
get_cindex()
Returns a concordance index from a coxph fit
get_hr()
Returns a hazard ratio and 95% CI for Polygenic Hazard Scores
get_or()
Return odds ratio for Polygenic Hazard Score at a particular age
get_phs_age()
Polygenic Hazard Score Age Calculation
km_curve()
Return Kaplan-Meier curve
phs_hist()
Plot Histogram of Cases and Controls by PHS
phs_input_example
PHS Input Example
test_data
PHS Test Data
